feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: added customClassnames for event-recurring tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17551
  • feat: Expose booking created at in v2 API response by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17452
  • feat: added customClassnames to event-availability tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17268
  • chore: bump lockfile by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17802
  • chore: Add ability to disable Sentry source maps by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17699
  • revert: "feat: install gcal + gvideo by default for google signups (#1â€¦ by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17803

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.7...v4.7.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: v2 booking confirmation emails not sent by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17764
  • ci: Add new release actions by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17789
  • feat: Render assignment reason on routing form report by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17791

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.8...v4.7.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: improvements for canceling workflow reminders by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17807
  • fix: Conditionally get the first assignment reason by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.9...v4.7.10

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: extract trpc and react-awesome-query-builder from atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17801
  • fix: target blank for event-type settings link by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17815
  • feat: past and overlapping ooo by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17373
  • feat: added custom classnames to event-assignment tab atom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17527
  • feat: added custom classnames for event-advanced tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17479
  • feat: added custom classnames for event-limits tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17478
  • fix: v2 booking location by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17817
  • refactor: conferencing apps atoms web wrapper by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17732
  • fix: change order of eventtypes and routingforms by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17615
  • feat: added customClassnames for event-setup tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17240
  • fix: api v2 webhook issue by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17831
  • fix: extract clientId header manually apiv2 (Revert) by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17832
  • fix: OOO redirect, email wrong formatting by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17829

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.10...v4.7.11

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: AI description - Backend for adding translation objects to EventType model by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17657
  • fix: outdated/broken og preview image for org events by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17812
  • chore: Add check to skip DB migrations as part of build by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17827
  • fix: UI issue in Phone Input dropdown by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17837
  • fix: Salesforce owner check, handle no contact email by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17834
  • chore: settings/organizations - remove pages router and use app router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/16774
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17842
  • fix: oauth client users controller permissions by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17822
  • chore: make throttler logs verbose by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17845
  • chore: use app router for settings/platform/members page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17849
  • fix: send attendee email with event updates of reassignment by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17836
  • fix: use tags icon for /settings/organizations/attributes page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17841
  • chore: exclude emails form field refactor by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17824
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17854
  • fix: round robin host reschedule error by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17855
  • fix: unable to remove banner by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17857
  • feat: Salesforce - pass company booking response to the Lead field by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17860
  • fix: provide fixed widths for DataTable columns by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.11...v4.7.12
